abstractContent.text: In this paper we introduce MULTIVOC, a real-world text-to-speech product geared to the French language.
Starting from a ordinary French text, MUL-TIVOC generates in real-time a high quality speech using a synthesis-by-diphone method.
The processing is divided into 3 main transformations (phoneti-zation, automatic prosody and rhythm marking, and generation of LPC frames).
This paper provides a full description of MULTIVOC including not only the technical view but also some applications of the product within the real world.
